availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Clements. Father of Anna Clements, George L. Clements, Baldwin Clements, Sallie H. Clements, Aaron W Clements, Mary F. Clements, Lucy G. Clements, and Bettie G. Clements. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 348.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 404B.
